text: Helena Rakoczy (née Krzynówek; 23 December 1921 - 2 September 2014), also Rákóczy or Rákóczi, was a Polish gymnast. She competed in two Summer Olympic Games: 1952 in Helsinki, Finland and 1956 in Melbourne, Australia. After a poor performance in 1952, she had a successful one in 1956, winning a bronze medal. After this, she became the most decorated gymnast from Poland. Rakoczy was born in Kraków. In 2004, she was added to the International Gymnastics Hall of Fame. Rakoczy died from natural causes on 2 September 2014 in Kraków, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Helena Rakoczy at Sports- Reference Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Polish gymnasts Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Poland Category:Sportspeople from Kraków Category:1952 Summer Olympics
title: Helena Rakoczy
